Adventurer Helper:
It is a simple task. It should kill the monsters embittered. Particularly concerned about the guild monsters that live on the Wall of Argos. Sorcerers believe that the creature fell under the influence of Shilen.
So they asked destroy Antelope Canyon, Canyon Antelope Slave, Drakolova Canyon Captive Drakolova Canyon Eye Savior Buffalo Slave, Eye of the Explorer, the Eye of Nightmare, Eye Watcher, Homunculus, Grendel Slave, Eye of Pilgrim elder Homunculus, Eye of the Ruler and the Infernal Beagle.
Collect Bloody Tears with these monsters.45 shares will be sufficient. All grasped?
